function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited infrastructure in informal urban settlements","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread due to lack of healthcare facilities and sanitation","Mitigation":"Improving infrastructure, providing access to healthcare, and implementing sanitation measures","Technologies":"Improved sanitation systems, mobile healthcare units, and telemedicine","People":"Inhabitants of informal urban settlements","Owner":"Local governments and NGOs"},{"Description":"Lack of data about informal settlements prior to and during emergencies","Impact":"Uncertainty in policymaking and difficulty in preparing for disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Collecting and maintaining data about informal settlements, especially related to health and population","Technologies":"Geospatial mapping, community health surveys, and digital data collection tools","People":"Policy makers, humanitarian organizations, and local governments","Owner":"Research organizations and local governments"},{"Description":"Inappropriate responses to disease outbreaks in informal settlements","Impact":"Ineffective or worsening situation due to lack of understanding and preparation","Mitigation":"Developing context-specific response plans, involving local communities in planning, and providing training on disease management","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, virtual training tools, and data-driven modeling for response planning","People":"Policy makers, humanitarian organizations, and local communities","Owner":"Local governments and humanitarian organizations"}]}
